tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  CARING
comments: She is a great prof and really wants each student to learn ASL. She is a little bit of a tough grader with your signing but thats because she wants you to learn. If you\'re willing to put the effort in and feel uncomfortable at times, you will learn so much in this class.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
stu_tags: CARING  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  AMAZING LECTURES
comments: I took her ASL course online and I\'m so glad it was online! That gave me the opportunity to watch lectures multiple times. She\'s fully immersive in ASL from the start--and I\'m so glad because it forced me to learn and infer until I KNEW the information. The coursebook/DVDs that was with the class is necessary. I really enjoyed learning from her

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Definitely the hardest intro level class I\'ve ever taken. I have never taken ASL before and was excited to learn, but that switched a few weeks into the semester. I didn\'t feel that I could ask questions without being made to feel dumb, and the feedback I received on assignments made me feel that way too. I wouldn\'t recommend.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: I was so looking forward to learning ASL this semester. This professor doesn\'t realize that not everyone is fluent in ASL and that they may struggle with it. Her feedback made me feel incompetent and that I was capable of being successful. If you want to learn ASL, DO NOT TAKE IT WITH HER.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: I was excited to start this class and learn ASL. After the third or forth week it got way to hard for me. She is a tough grader. Doesn\'t help explain a lot of what you have to do. I would not recommend her at all.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Sherri is a good teacher, but she isn\'t a fair grader. She will give do overs to some people and she won\'t give the same option to others. She is totally deaf and doesn\'t speak, so when you don\'t understand something you feel like and idiot. Very hard Intro class.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: ASL 1 was challenging, I learned a lot but this course took a lot of work. Each week outside of class you have to watch videos and do small assignments. You also have to make youtube videos of yourself signing which she then grades. I took the class as an elective, but its not an easy A. be prepared to put in many hours each week, but its doable

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: I was very excited to take this class. After 3 weeks I knew I didn\'t like it. She would go through things so fast and never explains the homework or what we did wrong. Over the semester I have dreaded more and more going to this class. She is deaf which makes it very difficult to ask questions.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: The best class ever professor is deaf but easy to understand. I recommend this class to anyone.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Teaches class entirely in ASL, pretty easy to understand because she\'s good at expressing what she\'s saying. There are 6 quizzes on D2L, a few assignments that go along with the chapters, and 5 pop quizzes. She is helpful if you have questions and a lot of fun to watch.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Learning ASL under Sherri\'s instruction was a awesome experience. The class is taught entirely in ASL, as Sherri is a member of the deaf community. This type of teaching made learning the language very interesting. At times, it was difficult to figure out what the class was supposed to do. However, after being exposed to the language, it\'s a breeze

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: This class was interesting but only take it if you really want to learn ASL. After this semester I feel that it was a waste of my time because I was not fully interested. The class is taught only in ASL, no talking is allowed!!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (4)  Caring (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
